decentralizedDriveText: Decentralised application, a developer dashboard and an end-user file hosting service. It is built to service developers while managing subscriptions or accessing a range of developer settings and tools. It is also built for end-users like you and me. It offers a file hosting service with cutting-edge decentralized storage solutions that empower users with full control and ownership of their data. Through dynamic Storage NFTs, users can securely manage their storage quotas and bandwidth capacities. The app provides a familiar "Cloud Storage" experience, syncing files across devices in a self-custodial, permissionless manner, ensuring that your digital assets remain private and secure across all platforms, accessible only to the private key owner.
newAccountPasswordText: Set your password. You will need your password to unlock PollinationX dApp
pageNotFound: Sorry, we can't find that page.
uploadFileOrDragDrop: Add new file or drag and drop
name: Name
noNftsInfo: Looks you don't have PX Storage NFT yet. You can mint it for free.
uploadedFilesSuccess: All files have been successfully uploaded
downloadFromBlockchainInfo: This action will download your latest data from the blockchain. Caution: all files that weren't synchronized with the blockchain will be removed.
uploadToBlockchainInfo: This action will synchronize the current content across devices. Caution: all files that you don't have here will be removed.
syncExtraContentFailed: Something went wrong. Content has not been successfully synced
createNewAccountPrivateKeyInfo: This is private key for your PX dApp account. Is linked to PX Storage NFT #. Do not share it with anyone and save it to the safe place!!! You can use it for account recovery or import account to another device.
resetNftSecretTitle: Are you sure you want to reset PX Storage NFT
resetNftSecretSubtitle: Export your private key before reset otherwise you lose all data!
uploadErrorInfo: Upload failed. Check storage quota, bandwidth or try again.
iSavedPrivateKey: I have saved the private key in a safe place!
iSavedPrivateKeyInfo: By securely storing my private key, I acknowledge that its loss would mean permanent loss of access to the files. PollinationX respects the self-custodial nature of ownership; hence, only the private key and PX sNFT holder possess access rights. PollinationX cannot retrieve lost private keys! Private key will be valid after first blockchain sync!
syncUsageStateSuccess: Usage state has been successfully synced
syncUsageStateFailed: Something went wrong. Usage state has not been successfully synced
